item.title: What's next for Berkshire Hathaway as longtime CEO Warren Buffett retires
item.description: After six decades running Berkshire Hathaway, the legendary investor Warren Buffett has officially stepped down as CEO.
item.content:encoded: After six decades running Berkshire Hathaway, the legendary investor Warren Buffett has officially stepped down as CEO.

item.title: Crypto soared in 2025 — and then crashed. Now what?
item.description: For most of 2025, cryptocurrencies such as bitcoin surged as President Trump vowed to make the U.S. a crypto leader. But now, a severe sell-off has shaken the sector.

item.title: Jim Beam to pause production at its main plant in 2026
item.description: Kentucky bourbon maker Jim Beam says it won't distill bourbon at its main plant in Clermont, Kentucky, for all of 2026 because of economics and changing consumer tastes.

item.title: It was a rough year for nightclubs
item.description: A number of promenant nightclubs and music venues closed across the country in 2025, part of an ongoing trend driven by high rents, decreasing alcohol consumption and monopolization.

item.title: Warren Buffett is retiring: We look back at a critical turning point in his career
item.description: Warren Buffett started out by identifying opportunities in undervalued companies. Later, his strategy was buying a company that would get bigger on its own. We look at that second phase of his career.

item.title: Book distributor shutting down deals logistical blow to libraries
item.description: Baker and Taylor is among a few companies that act as the distribution middle man between libraries and publishers. The company's announcement that it is shutting down is a blow to librarians.
